A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With a title so intriguing it makes all viewers want to explore the question\, \"who is the last Jedi?\" I'm not necessarily excited\, rather than interested in the film. The cinematography in the last movie was outstanding. Though\, the new film has a new director\, which isn't always the best option. Rogue One truly wowed the crowed and it to had a new director. With that being said\, the director of the project filmed such movies as \"Looper\"\, so we truly can't judge until we watch.
